This is documentation for the Beame SDK.

The Beame SDK provides tools that allow you to create X509 credentials to identify machines and devices. It's a simple way to use encryption-based identity in web and mobile applications.

* See [Beame SDK on GitHub](https://github.com/beameio/beame-sdk)
* [Beame SDK NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/beame-sdk)
